lines.text: Hands up, drop your weapons! Freeze all! You are arrested, Semaca!
Hold your fire, commissioner! I promise to you - none will move!
Mr. Semaca! This is me, Lascarica! Please, believe me that I didn't betray you! I was brought here forcefully! Can you hear me, Mr. Semaca...?
Drop your weapons! You are all under arrest!
Commissioner, please, allow me to explain...
Miclovan...! Hey, old chap! What's up with you? Is it serious?
Piece of cake... They riddled me.
Well... I counted on your flair...
Too bad... that you stood in front of him.
I didn't know it hurts so...
Commissioner, shall I bring a car for you?
